title: Pc freeze through tapping out
body: i reinstalled my windows and my league for 2 days since this moment everytime i try to tap out of the game everything freezes. It doesn't matter when i tap out. In the game and in the loading screen both times everything freezes and it doesn't matter how long i wait it never start working again :(.

replies.body: Sorry but that did not solve my problem. So everytime i am ingame everything is fine i can talk in discord or have a video on my second monitor but in the second where i press alt + tab everything freeze. The Video stops but i still listen the sound of it. I can't hear waht happend in discord and i can't speak there and lol freeze mouse is frozen and it did not tab me out of league.

This could be happening for a few reasons, especially after an OS reinstall.  Firstly, make sure your OS is up to date.  If you're on Windows 10, the freezing could be caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been know to do that.  Disabling it should do the trick!

I also recommend going over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your drivers are up to date as well and not causing issues between tasks.  I hope that helps!
